title: Moto Maniac 2
description: Moto Maniac 2 is a side-scrolling dirt bike riding game with a mission to overcome all the obstacles as fast as you can. This game is a sequel toMoto Maniacand set in a different environment. This time you are playing on bridges in the night. The bridges are under construction, so you have to be careful not to fall into the abyss and not to hit your head. On top of the obstacles on the way, it's dark! Fortunately, you have a drone that will light your way.
